name: DROPConnect
0:
”Alexa, open DROP Connect”
”Alexa, ask DROP Connect to check my water usage”
”Alexa, ask DROP Connect to turn my water off”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drop connect
des: With the DROP Connect skill for Amazon Alexa, you can check your water usage, check if your water is turned on/off, and turn the water on/off. If you don't have a DROP system yet, please visit https://dropconnect.com/products.
